Equipment Cleaning Records
DOCUMENT NO.: ECR-SYN-4736 REVISION: 1.0
PRODUCT NAME: Nitroso Aryl Piperazine Quetiapine
PRODUCT CODE: VE009S54
BATCH NO.: VOY756
LOT NO.: LOT-APR-002
MANUFACTURING SITE: SynTech Pharmaceuticals Inc.
MANUFACTURING LINE: Line 4 – Injectable Fill Line
CLEANING DATE: 2025-04-14
CLEANING METHOD: Manual CIP followed by SIP
QA REVIEW DATE: 2025-04-15
Equipment Details
Equipment ID Equipment Name Location Last Used Date Status
MIX-401 Mixing Vessel Line 4 – Prep Room 2025-04-13 Cleaned
FILL-402 Filling Machine Line 4 – Fill Room 2025-04-13 Cleaned
TANK-460 Holding Tank Line 4 – Fill Room 2025-04-13 Cleaned
PUMP-210 Transfer Pump Line 4 – Fill Room 2025-04-13 Cleaned
FILTER-115 Sterile Filter Line 4 – Fill Room 2025-04-13 Cleaned
Comments:
All equipment listed above was used in Batch A0074 and underwent full cleaning per SOP-
CLEAN-401. No damage or residue observed prior to cleaning.
Cleaning Information
Equipment ID Cleaning Agent Cleaning Method Duration Operator Initials
MIX-401 IPA + WFI Manual CIP 45 min ML
FILL-402 IPA + WFI Manual CIP + SIP 60 min RD
TANK-460 NaOH + WFI Manual CIP 40 min ST
PUMP-210 IPA + WFI Manual CIP 30 min ST
FILTER-115 Autoclaved SIP 60 min ST
Cleaning Log Reference: CLN-APR-2025-04
SOP Reference: SOP-CLEAN-401
Cleaning Verification Method: Swab Test, Visual Inspection, Conductivity Check

Inspection and Testing
Equipment Visual Swab Test Conductivity Inspection QA
ID Inspection Result Pass Initials

Comments:
All equipment passed inspection. Swab tests showed no detectable residue. Conductivity results
confirmed rinse effectiveness. Filter was autoclaved and verified sterile.
